body: Hi @penpornk since MklSmallSizeAllocator is just a wrapper over libc malloc/free, it does not need to deallocate anything in destructor. The constructor is not allocating any memory either. Makes sense?
body_html: Hi @penpornk since MklSmallSizeAllocator is just a wrapper over libc malloc/free, it does not need to deallocate anything in destructor. The constructor is not allocating any memory either. Makes sense?
body_text: Hi @penpornk since MklSmallSizeAllocator is just a wrapper over libc malloc/free, it does not need to deallocate anything in destructor. The constructor is not allocating any memory either. Makes sense?
